roles.title: Designer
roles.description: Generate aesthetic layouts, color palettes, typography, and UI flows, ensuring accessibility and visual balance.

roles.title: Engineer
roles.description: Implement designs into clean, modular, and performant code, focusing on responsive design and accessibility.

roles.title: Prompt Engineer
roles.description: Structure workflows and ensure clarity in agent instructions, system prompt engineering.

roles.title: Task-Agnostic Step (TAS) extractor (flash)
roles.description: Identify and return each 'Task Agnostic Step' (TAS) towards the high-level goal.

steps.name: uTASe
steps.task: Extract the primary Task-Agnostic Steps (TAS) for creating the AI frontend website, establishing a high-level project roadmap.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Synthesize the TAS from uTASe into a coherent project plan and define the initial system prompt for the AI this website will interface with.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Based on the project plan, create low-fidelity wireframes and define the core user interaction flow for the AI frontend.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Review the wireframes for technical feasibility and set up the initial project structure, including framework selection and repository creation.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Develop a high-fidelity visual design system, including a color palette, typography, and component mockups based on the approved wireframes.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Translate the high-fidelity designs into responsive and accessible frontend components using modular code.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Refine the AI's system prompt and create user-facing microcopy (button text, instructions, placeholders) that aligns with the UI and guides the user effectively.

steps.name: Kodax
steps.task: Integrate the frontend components into a cohesive application and connect to the AI system's API endpoints.

steps.name: Aurora
steps.task: Conduct a design review of the implemented website to ensure it aligns with the high-fidelity mockups and accessibility standards.

steps.name: Lyra
steps.task: Perform end-to-end testing of the user flow, focusing on the clarity of instructions and the quality of the AI interaction.

steps.name: uTASe
steps.task: Identify the next steps for iteration, such as user feedback collection, feature enhancement, or performance optimization.
